organic.title: Providence Center for Advanced Heart Disease & Transplant
organic.snippet: As the only heart transplant center in the region, we are a heart destination for patients from Washington, northeast Oregon, Idaho and Montana.

organic.title: Doctors for Center for Advanced Heart Disease & Transplant
organic.snippet: Doctors at Providence Center for Advanced Heart Disease & Transplant include Andrew T. Coletti, MD, Sarah M. Eggerstorfer, ARNP, and M Cristy Smith, MD. Located at 62 West 7th Avenue, Spokane, WA.
